episode.title: He Was Sort of Anti-Golf
episode.rawTitle: 121: ‘He Was Sort of Anti-Golf’ With Guest Rene Ritchie
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Rene Ritchie returns to the show. Topics includes Jony Ive’s promotion to Chief Design Officer and the implications for Apple; the differences in Apple’s internal design culture now that industrial and user interface design are under one roof; Google’s announcements at their I/O developer conference last week in San Francisco, including Google Photos; “machine learning”; Apple replacing the much-maligned discoveryd with good old mDNSResponder in the latest Yosemite developer beta; our thoughts on the space black Apple Watch with link bracelet; and more.
